game.title: ELDEN RING Shadow of the Erdtree

image.title: ELDEN RING Shadow of the Erdtree

content.value: Basically an Elden Ring sequel. Improved on world design in every way possible, with the entire map feeling like a dungeon. Boss fights were incredible, although real difficult. Only complaints are about the final boss (it sucks) and scadutree fragments (ruin replayability).
